column4: is there a way to log into a linux machine from a windows machine to make changes etc?
ssh in, or run vnc, or use xming, and have a remote X session

vnc is a very handy and powerfull tool. if you just want 1 monitor.. If you have multi-pc's eac with a display, you can use 'syngery' (i think i spelt it right) to controll them via a single keyboard/mouse.
